definition: skin cast off during molting/exuvium/to pupate/to molt/to slough/to cast off an old skin or shell
skin cast off during molting/exuvia/to pupate/to molt/to slough/to cast off an old skin or shell

sentences.english: The lesions will "bleach out" and become clean wounds that will heal after a molt.
sentences.chinese: 病變會“漂白了”，成爲清潔傷口癒合後，將蛻皮。

sentences.english: It was like that for a long time; they grow old and molt.
sentences.chinese: 再多的都一樣，到老的那一天，就會蛻皮。

sentences.english: What of the old serpent who cannot shed his skin, and calls all others naked and shameless?
sentences.chinese: 對無法蛻皮而稱他人的赤裸爲不知羞恥的老蛇呢？

sentences.english: Nymphs go through their molting cycle and mature to adults in about seven days.
sentences.chinese: 若蟲經過他們的蛻皮週期和成熟的成年人在約七天。

sentences.english: The old cuticle is digested by molting fluid .
A few days after burning your skin may peel.
sentences.chinese: 灼燒之後幾天，你可能會蛻皮。

sentences.english: Hormones regulate many insect functions, including ecdysis and metamorphosis.
sentences.chinese: 激素調節昆蟲的許多功能，包括蛻皮和變態。

sentences.english: Larvae grow quickly and shed their skin several times.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲成長迅速並且蛻皮數次。

sentences.english: This is where the infected crayfish will get "stuck" in a moult.
sentences.chinese: 這是在受感染的小龍蝦將獲得“停留在蛻皮”。

sentences.english: They don't shed and can be trained to use a litter box.
sentences.chinese: 他們不會蛻皮還能訓練他們使用一些小的盒子。

sentences.english: I watched our pet snake shed its skin.
sentences.chinese: 我觀察我們家的寵物蛇蛻皮。

sentences.english: Freshly molted with new still tender and flexible .
sentences.chinese: 剛蛻皮的，新殼還比較柔嫩。

sentences.english: Molting was tiring and took a lot of time.
sentences.chinese: 說到那個蛻皮，相當累人，也相當花時間。

sentences.english: It happens as a natural consequence of their growth.
sentences.chinese: 隨着它們的生長，蛻皮是自然的過程。

sentences.english: Rattlesnakes add a segment to their iconic rattles each time they molt.
sentences.chinese: 每次蛻皮之後，響尾蛇標誌性的環節尾都會增加一節。

sentences.english: Molting and metamorphosis are the typical developmental characters in holometabolous insects.
sentences.chinese: 蛻皮與變態是全變態昆蟲典型的發育特徵。

definition: giant Amazon snail (Ampullaria gigas spix), that has devastated rice paddies in China since its introduction in the 1980s
